1.1.name: wordpress/random-product
1.1.description: This widget will select a random product from the WP e-Commerce (part of WP-Shopping-cart) list of products and display in a given sidebar. This plugin will only work with the WP e-Commerce plugin. It requires that permalinks be enabled so that the link from the widget will work properly.
